ActCriminal Code
SubjectOrder Amending the Order Declaring an Amnesty Period (2020)
PrecisOrder AMENDING THE ORDER DECLARING AN AMNESTY PERIOD (2020) in order to (1) permit the Bank of Canada security personnel to resume use of its current inventory of firearms; (2) allow sustenance hunters and those exercising a section 35 Constitution Act, 1982 right to transport a prohibited firearm that was formerly non-restricted, for safety purposes; (3) protect individuals who purchased or entered into an agreement to purchase newly prohibited, firearms on or before April 30, 2020, and who did not become holders of a registration certificate on or before that date; (4) protect owners, individuals and businesses who provide alternative storage and transportation for newly prohibited firearms for this purpose; (5) protect individuals who deactivate now prohibited firearms on behalf of owners; and (6) extend the Amnesty Order until October 30, 2023 to allow affected owners further time to come into compliance with the law.
